name: create_idos_profile
title: Create idOS profile
description: Create your idOS Profile to start your journey.

name: follow_on_x
title: Follow idOS X
description: Follow idOS_network on X to stay up to date and hear about the latest quests.

name: join_telegram
title: Join idOS TG
description:
Join the idOS Community Telegram 
 to chat with the idOS team.

name: referral_program
title: Refer a friend
description: Refer a friend! Once they create an idOS profile, you will earn points. The more friends you refer, the more points you earn.

name: daily_check
title: Daily check
description:
Login daily to earn points. 
 You can claim points only once per day. 
 (resets at 00:00 UTC)

name: complete_kyc
title: Complete KYC
description: To access all of the features of this app, complete a KYC journey and add the credential encrypted to your idOS profile. Noone (not even idOS) will have access unless you share an Access Grant!

name: add_face_as_signer
title: Add face as signer
description: Create your idOS FaceSign to manage your account with idOS' privacy-preserving biometrics.

name: share_authorization_grant
title: Share an Access Grant
description: Share an Access Grant to your credential to onboard into a new service without verifying your data again.

name: staking_event
title: Participate in Staking Event
description: Stake any amount of NEAR or ETH in the idOS Staking Event to bootstrap security for the idOS network.

name: ico_event
title: Participate in ICO Event
description: Contribute any amount to the IDOS ICO.
